extendedInfo.description: Set yourself apart with this Personality Test when you use it for the job hiring process.Learn how to put your best foot forward when interviewing by understanding your work orientation, talents, and motivational considerations.People vary greatly in their behaviors, their abilities, and their preferences. This Personality Questionnaire is a tool for clarifying and differentiating the abilities that people individually bring to the workplace. Every person brings an individual set of natural behavioral abilities or talents to the workplace. For each of us, our talents are the most secure and rewarding platform on which to build our careers. To enhance the satisfaction that you gain from your work experience and to maximize your performance potential, we believe that you should be aware of your particular talents and seek to develop them further at every opportunity.  In addition, people perform best in jobs where the activities and expectations are personally motivating, where they are doing what they like to do, and where they feel that they are using their abilities.  Learn this and more.The included free summary report is intended to help you facilitate your own development and learn how you can achieve greater personal satisfaction from your work experience. In addition to the free personality report a graphic interaction styles graph is included to provide a visual representation of your personality.  With Job Advantage you not only get access to a personality test used by over 100,000 people in the last 8 years you have the ability to store and email both your resume and personality report to potential employers no matter where you are.  Never worry about running out of resumes when you are at a job fair.Best of all, it is free.  To learn more about EXS Partners please visit us at http://www.exspartners.com.You may gain access to the web based version of this application at https://mobile.exspartners.comThank you and good luck!

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: I tapped around to put my info in and it refuses to let me select any feilds or bring up my touch keyboard.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Right to the Point
reviews.comment: It\'s fast & easy! Best of all you get quality feedback so you can be aware of what you bring to the table at any workplace.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Doesnt give any career suggestions. Sucks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: I like it but its my app.  Looking forward to hearing what other users think.  I hope it is helpful to those individuals searching for a job.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Right on!
reviews.comment: The test was hugely accurate in its conclusions about my skills as well as passions. Reconnecting with that is a great who boost.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great and totally hit everything on the nail
reviews.author: A Google User
